titles.title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to require public notice of excess real property, and for other purposes.
To amend title 40, United States Code, to require public notice of excess real property, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Requires the Administrator of the General Services Administration (GSA) to publish in the Federal Register any report by an executive agency of excess real property in its inventory.
